To continue with the climate change topic I posted a few days ago.. this post will further build upon the argument on how our species have greatly damaged the world in pursuit of money and identity.

Modern civilization as we know it was built by countless wars and religion. Our country the Philippines for example identifies itself from the religion it acquired from Spain in 1521. The Catholic church still influence the people and the government in their tasks. Also the age of coloniza
Economies were built in pursuit of power and profit.

A lot of my understanding of the issues in climate change were fortified with my experiences living in the islands for more than a year and acquiring a better understanding of the science of physics and astronomy - the language of the natural world.

This is the greatest threat to our existence and I feel the urgency of spreading knowledge and insights.
